facts.text: Theo Corbeanu is on loan to Toronto FC from which club? Granada
Ola Brynhildsen is on loan to Toronto FC from which club? Midtjylland
Maxime Dominguez is on loan to Toronto FC from which club? Vasco da Gama
Cassius Mailula is on loan to which club from Toronto FC? Wydad AC
Who is the head coach of Toronto FC as of January 10, 2025? Robin Fraser
Who served as the interim head coach of Toronto FC from June 26, 2023, to October 7, 2023? Terry Dunfield
Which coach had the highest win percentage during their tenure with Toronto FC? Greg Vanney
Chris Armas had what win percentage during his tenure with Toronto FC? 13.33%
Who was the general manager of Toronto FC in 2023? Jason Hernandez
Bob Bradley served as head coach of Toronto FC until which year? 2023
Who is the captain of Toronto FC as mentioned in the list? Jonathan Osorio
Toronto FC won the MLS Cup in which year? Answer: 2017
How many Canadian Championships has Toronto FC won as of the last update? Answer: 8
In what year did Toronto FC win both the MLS Cup and the Supporters' Shield? Answer: 2017
Toronto FC reached the final of the CONCACAF Champions League in which year? Answer: 2018
Who were the top goalscorers for Toronto FC in the 2020 MLS season, each scoring 9 goals? Answer: Ayo Akinola and Alejandro Pozuelo
Sebastian Giovinco scored how many goals in the 2015 season for Toronto FC? Answer: 22
Greg Vanney won Coach of the Year in which season? Answer: 2017
Toronto FC finished in what position in the Eastern Conference during the 2020 MLS season? Answer: 2nd
Toronto FC's first participation in the CONCACAF Champions League was in which season? Answer: 2009-10
Toronto FC was eliminated in the semi-finals of the CONCACAF Champions League by which team in the 2011-12 season? Answer: Santos Laguna
